Summary: One big flashing multi colored disc with 3 smaller ships dart through the sky
divs: Sighting Details We were outside then we saw a weird looking thing (what we thought was a star) and upon closer inspection it was flashing reds blues greens whites oranges, then saw to the left of the ship a smaller light white in color dot straight up into the sky. Then shortly after to the right of the ship we saw another same sized ship dart up. About thirty minutes later we saw another ship dart of but this one made a backwards c shape towards the ship. Me and my step brother saw it. 1. Outside having a cigarette 2. The flashing colors 3.A star or airplane tower 4.The big one swerved back and forth and over time a drastic movement up and slightly down on occasions 5. Disbelieve, scared, in shock, and at times excitement 6. We didn't lose sight of the main one, we were to freaked out to see anything else move around it.
